title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A1, the response must correctly explain one reason why an authoritarian state would allow citizens to criticize the government.

For Task A2, the response must correctly explain a second reason why an authoritarian state would allow citizens to criticize the government.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a policy adopted by a specific country to restrict criticism of the government.

Points for each task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the three tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
